name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-channel-group-spfx
title: Channel/group tab in SharePoint Framework
shortDescription: Starting with the SharePoint Framework v1.8, you can implement your Microsoft Teams tabs using SharePoint Framework. Using SharePoint Framework significantly simplifies Teams tab development process as Teams tabs can be automatically hosted within SharePoint without any need for external services
longDescription: Starting with the SharePoint Framework v1.8, you can implement your Microsoft Teams tabs using SharePoint Framework. Using SharePoint Framework significantly simplifies Teams tab development process as Teams tabs can be automatically hosted within SharePoint without any need for external services

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing channel/group tab in sharepoint framework
